I understand that the queue is probably long in off peak times, but 8 hours of the queue being turned off??

The time when the queue is up I'll mostly be at work, and though there's a few hours I can catch it once I'm back home it really feels like these are tiny windows of opportunity for me to actually enjoy this game mode. 

It actually makes me more annoyed about this whole rotating queue thing to have it on only sometimes during the times when it's sometimes available.
